mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user WHERE user_name = #{user_name} and user_pwd = #{user_pwd};

SELECT a.user_id , a.user_name , b.common_code_m_text AS type, a.gender, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i %s') create_date, DATE_FORMAT(a.last_login_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i %s') last_login_date, CASE a.state WHEN '1' THEN '在线' ELSE '离线' END AS state
FROM user a LEFT JOIN common_code b ON b.common_code_m = a.type
and user_name like '%${user_name}%'

select a.scripture_user_id, a.scripture_user_name, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS create_date, b.common_code_m_text AS type, c.recite_date, COUNT(c.scripture_user_id) AS recite_count,
(SELECT d.recite_date FROM scripture_recite_records d WHERE d.scripture_user_id = a.scripture_user_id ORDER BY d.recite_date DESC LIMIT 0,1 ) as last_recite_date,
(SELECT CASE count(e.record_id) WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM scripture_recite_records e WHERE e.scripture_user_id = a.scripture_user_id AND e.recite_date = CURDATE()) AS recited_YN,
CASE DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= CURRENT_DATE WHEN 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS one_week from scriptureuser a left join common_code b on b.common_code_m = a.type left join scripture_recite_records c on c.recite_date >= DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') and c.recite_date <= DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 7 DAY) and c.scripture_user_id = a.scripture_user_id where b.common_code_m = '2001' group by a.scripture_user_id
mapper.insert: insert into scripture_recite_records( record_id , scripture_user_id , recite_date ) values ( UUID() , #{scripture_user_id} , NOW() )
insert into scriptureuser( scripture_user_id , scripture_user_name , create_date , type ) values ( UUID() , #{scripture_user_id} , NOW(), '2001' )
